text.author: aji nugraha, Jeff, Imesha San and others (see URL)
text.title: How to Make Vegan Cupcakes
text.summary1: (human1) Two recipes for 18-24 vegan cupcakes (with vanilla extract for vanilla, or cocoa for chocolate flavor), using soy milk and cider vinegar, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, oil and salt, as well as optionally fruit puree, baked in the oven for around 20 minutes.
text.summary2: (claude-3-5-sonnet-20241022) This vegan cupcake recipe provides two methods for making vanilla or chocolate cupcakes using plant-based ingredients like soy milk and vegetable oil, with various tips for flavor variations and substitutions to achieve light, fluffy results perfect for any occasion.
text.summary3: (gpt4o) The article discusses two vegan cupcake methods, featuring vanilla and chocolate recipes adaptable with various icings; It covers ingredient substitutions, preparation steps, and tips like using different oils, replacing sugar with maple or rice syrup, and adding variety with alternative flavorings and pureed fruits.
text.summary4: (Llama-3.2-3B-Instruct) This article provides two recipes for vegan cupcakes, one for basic vanilla cupcakes and one for basic chocolate cupcakes, with detailed instructions on how to prepare the batter, bake the cupcakes, and frost them with vegan icing.
text.summary5: (Qwen2.5-7B-Instruct) This article provides two methods for making vegan cupcakes, including ingredient lists and step-by-step instructions for basic vanilla and chocolate cupcakes, along with tips for variations and additions.
